workshoptitle: DB Security - Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Introduction: Audit Vault and Database Firewall (AVDF)
tutorials.description: Understand the architecture of this workshop and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Reset the randomly generated password
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to reset the ranndomly generated password in Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Assess and Discover
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to Assess and Discover in Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Audit and Monitor
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to Audit and Monitor Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Report and Alert
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to Report and set Alerts in Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Protect and Prevent
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to Protect and Prevent in Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Advanced features configuration (optional)
tutorials.description: In this lab you can learn more about advanced configurations in Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Reset the AVDF lab configuration
tutorials.description: In this lab you will reset the AVDF lab configuration

tutorials.title: Appendix
tutorials.description: Learn more about Oracle Audit Vault and DB Firewall (AVDF)

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
